Посмотрим, вроде лучше...
在同水平比赛中是款很有趣的恐（搞）怖（笑）游戏，但遇到dalao会対新手游戏体验...emmm造成一些困扰，总体来说不错。

Le jeux est totalement cassé tu peut perdre ta sauvegarde en meme pas 3 sec, Des tueur campeur des allié qui te ramene le tueur pour te tuer sans que l'autre sois tuer vraiment un jeux pourris avec une communauté pourrite
สนุกกมากครับ ผมชอบระบบเช็คปิง ^ ^

整體來說，無論是成為逃生者還是殺手，都是不錯的體驗，可以跟朋友開黑組成車隊挑戰殺手更加有趣。

**官方最近很積極的推出新的DLC角色，而且不斷在BUG方面進行修復，就像game director Mathiue說的一樣他們做的是服務型遊戲，以服務玩家為主，所以我只有一句話，I think you did a pretty good job so far

不好的地方就是BUG巨多，另外就是匹配系統經常會讓相同段位的新手和老玩家相遇，容易對新手造成不好的遊戲體驗。更值得一提的是現在修理發電機的速度很快，令到大量殺手成為Camper(守屍流)，即使改弱Anti-camp的技能也無法阻止Camper越來越多的事實。

對於新手逃生者：
1. 先熟悉附近可能的逃生路線
2. 學會卡殺手的視野盲點
3. 訓練自己skillcheck按中白色區域
4. 遊戲得分最快的項目按順序為 被追、砸暈殺手、拯救隊友、維修發電機、逃生成功，治療拆圖騰看情況

新手殺手：
1. 注意血跡及紅色劃痕的走向
2. 集中聆聽受傷逃生者的聲音
3. 追逐時盡量只走直線
4. 守在勾子下只會讓分數下降，在附近巡視更好

只是一些小建議，希望大家都愛上這遊戲。<3

友人間で遊ぶならいい鬼ごっこ・かくれんぼゲーム。ホラーの雰囲気も相まって、追い付かれたときなんて叫び声が出るくらいには怖い。

野良はゲームの体を成していない。煽りに次ぐ煽り、不利になった瞬間に切断、初心者狩り。運営が取り締まらない、ペナルティを設けないのも相まってこれらの糞悪マナーの糞プレイヤーが蔓延しており、まともにプレイなぞできない。繰り返すが野良はゲームの体を成していない。

要求スペック表には書かれていないが、楽しみたいなら対戦好きなフレンドを3,4人用意するべきだ。居ないなら買うべきではない。
Really fun, really scary, great game. Great to play with friends.

Edit: I believe in being fair. While I stand by my feelings regarding many aspects of the game, I did finally hear from BEhavior. They were effusive in their apologies for the long reply and awarded my wife 830,600,000 bloodpointys to restore her characters. With that said, I have to say that my main gripe has been addressed. However, many of the other issues really need to be worked out and improved. If you submit a ticket to BEhavior, expect to wait a few weeks to a month for resolution of your issue via bloodpoint reward. I can cautiously recommend this game again...with the caveat that you backup your save and, in my case, disable Steam cloud saves.


So here are the facts about this game:

Pros:
-Incredibly addictive, fun to play
-Great maps
-Great killers

Cons:
-Developers do not respond when you need assistance. My wife lost her save data due to a well known issue with this game and the Steam cloud. She lost over 1,100 hours of bloodpoints and prestiges over multiple characters. We went on the forums, found the method to ask the dev for help. They replied that they would get back to us and that they appreciated our patience. That was a month ago. Since then we have requested help two more times sending them all the information they asked for...no response.
-Survivors are lacking in true ethnic diversity. Mostly white. No Latinos,Hispanics, Middle-Eastern people, and no Black men. It has a distinctly Eurocentric myopic feel to it. Not super welcoming to people of color to have super limited options for them to play as people who represent them.
-Leatherface is a reskin and rehash of the Hillbilly with slightly different perks. Even his weapons are not realy different.
-The game is supremely glitchy and it gets to be really hard to play if the host has poor internet
-Plenty of hackers on here who make the experience less than fun far too often
-Survivors have a bunch of mediocre outfits that offer no bonuses in and of themselves...just looks

With that said I still play this game, as does my wife, because we have supported it from the beta stage and sunk so much money and time into all of the add-on content; Which was mostly not really worth it. We stuck by this game because we thought the devs were really trying to do things differently. I bought multiple copies of it  for friends and family. But in the end they behave no better than EA, or 2K games. They are only about the bottom-line and could care less about the people who were loyal to them and helped to stuff their pockets and promoted their game at the grass roots. I am extremely disappointed. 

I can't in good conscience recommend this game to someone else, knowing how BEhavior treated us as customers and gamers.

i love this game, with my almost 500 hours in. Its a great game to play with friends to try and rank up your killers and survivors.

Spiele es seit dem letzten Gratis-Wochenende und bin begeistert. Kacke mir selbst tagsüber halb ins Hemd, wenn urplötzlich die eine Killerin aus dem Boden schiesst, die Musik von "Halloween" eingespielt wird, oder eine Glocke läutet. Kann die ganzen Meckereien hier nicht verstehen, finde es als Überlebender etwas schwerer, aber nicht unmachbar. Hängt stark von den Mitspielern ab, die manchmal mega dämlich handeln und damit die Runde versauen. Als Killer hat man auch extrem viel Spaß, finde es aber nicht immer leicht mit ihnen. Es gibt genügend Überlebende, die dann nervige Marathonläufe um Felsen veranstalten und jedes Mal 180° Wenden hinlegen. Genau so gibt es aber Leute, die jemanden hängen und direkt davor campen. Das ist nervig.. Kann man nur mit Teamspeak lösen, weil die Anderen es erstens nicht interessiert und sie weiter Motoren reparieren, oder sonst zwei weitere Überlebende Niedergeschlagen werden und die Runde damit meist schon klar ist.

Aber so - super Spiel, macht Spaß, vor allem mit Freunden! Hab es nicht bereut und erwarte schon die nächsten Updates ( hoffentlich keine 10€ DLC...)

job so far

So I play this game since the end of 2016, bought nearly every dlc and played many hours. 
I played this game with and without friends, as killer, but mainly as an survivor. At first this game was really fun besides the bugs and glitches that are still there, even though not that bad anymore, but the game balance completly changed since that. The killers were to hard to play for people without experience, so I kinda understood why the devs merfed them. But instead of hear what survivors think too, the devs only heard of baby killers, so every new killer who comes to the game gets more powerful than the last one, while the survivors get unusefull perks. Thats annoying and not only for me. Many people who I talked to about dbd got bored cause either u get in a match with bad survivors, so u have no chance to survive, without being an asshole and letting the others die, or u get a baby killer, that camps or even facecamps. I played it in the last few days to see, what the new update brought...so well besides that this game is expensive if u buy all the dlcs, no now they have an ingame store where u have to pay even more money, to customize your characters a bit ?! I really dont know why the devs do what they do. I had lots of hours fun in this game, but i wouldnt recommend it to anyone. The devs dont care about the players, they just want to make more money. So people please dont waste your money in this game...

I had my first taste of DBD on the XOne. At first i was just watching and thinking to myself "This game is stupid". Then I was given a try. As soon as I put on the headphones, it was a whole different ballgame.i felt my heart start to pick up in speed. Its alright... its just sound. So i picked my first character. They didnt tell me how to do anything so i tested out how to play. This did this and that did that ect. Then i started to hear a creepy hum. Oh that hum scared me the most. I started to run and i got louder and louder. I looked back for a second and was like "NOPE"!!! This game is a good scary game and is a challange. But warning, you need Direct X 11 to play it. Direct X 12 should work but it wont start up the game unless you have 11. Figure out how to get Direct X 11 and your set for a good scare

Just came back after quitting due to the game having killers who are too OP mixed with them camping and its just a sad time with little to no enjoyment. Come back and its the same thing. Best concept but they need to nerf this game to a point where it can actually be competitive and not a 50/50 chance of getting trolled. I will not support this game until then.

Одна из любимых хоррор-игрулек. Ох уж эти побегушки от сумасшедших маньяков... Очень динамично и атмосферно:) Игра прекрасно передаёт ту самую обстановку из фильмов ужасов. Здесь все довольно просто. 4 выживших, целью которых является починка генераторов, для того чтобы избежать лап зверя,в то время, когда маньяк вовсе не дремлет и жаждет вашей крови.Становится вдвойне страшно, когда убегаешь от реального маньяка, пускай даже сидя за компьютером :) У каждого сурва и убийцы есть индивидуальные способности, что делает каждую катку непредсказуемой и интересной. Спасибо разработчикам за постоянные патчи, DLC с новыми картами, безумными убийцами и выжившими. P. S. Отдельное спасибо за комплект одежды с котиками, крокодилами и глазастым сурикатом:) Забавно и очень мило!) 10 из 10.

Tl; dr : A yes and a no. I'd pick 'maybe' if there's one. 

DBD is not carrying a new genre up its sleeve but they make quite a good job at it to be honest. Multiple characters/killers of more then 15 to pick from with each having different traits is a good first impression. The game mechanics is fun + funny at times and some times it could be the point of turning back for newcomers. 

Newbies coming into the genre of survival horror might not get the concept of 'surviving the horror' and could easily be demotivated to replay the game after a few  easy kills by a level 50 killer since balance only comes once in a blue moon when matchmaking. This is so much an issue for most people to a point that even veterans would be indulging themselves in a game of DODGE while in lobby before the match even starts.

Veteran killers would be busy dodging matchmaking with people who wont click ready up to the last 10 sec simply bcoz survivors could switch characters with better perks + items + addons, of which could easily overpower the killer if he is not prepared for a 4 man purple flashlight galore. 

Balance aside, then comes the constant disconnection in game, by both survivors and the killers. This will eventually lead to a frustation as you spent 30 full minutes crawling, fixing, sabotaging, destroying totems.... only for the killer to DC (because he was being juked forever) and everybody got bloodpoints below 10k. 

This game is tiring on the pubs, but much fun to have when played with friends and families. 

So its a 'maybe' for me.

Très bon jeu avec des hauts et des bas.

Positifs: Très dynamique on ne s'ennuie pas,le skill fait le joueur c'est évident que les perks donne un avantage mais sans plus.Un systéme bien mieux fait qu'au début du jeu ! Avant on devait attendre 30 min vers décembre pour trouver un match,actuellement en 15 secondes-2 minutes max on trouve.Puis une bonne panoplie de tueurs et de survivants,avec pas mal de perks qui permettent de faire des bons assortiment si on joue solo ou en groupe.

Négatifs: Le face camping et clairement présent comparer au début de ce jeu,c'est très chiant de voir un tueur plombé la partie d'un pote ou de moi même.Ca fait partie du jeu,c'est très cancérigéne j'espère que les développeurs vont remédier à ça et voir que celà tue pas mal la communauté.

Concrètement:Le jeu et dans une bonne lancer le problème qui cause du tort à DbD c'est le face camping qui fait partie intégrante du jeu et qui froise beaucoup de joueurs.Sinon globalement la communauté Fr et pas mal à part quelque kikoo qui insulte tous ce qui passe devant eux et des games aggréables dont beaucoup moin de rageux présent.
ชอบเกมนี้นะ สนุก มาก อยากให้มาเล่นกันเยอะๆนะครับ

Bon jeu, mais communauté de merde.

Des DLCs aussi chers que le jeu et si bien équilibrés à leur sortie qu'il y a toujours besoin que la communauté demande un nerf des nouveaux persos qui sortent.

Un système de skin pour attirer les kikoo-sasuke qui veulent un joli perso tout vêtu de noir avec une capuche et des Nike et tout çà pour seulement 27€ (j'exagère peut être le prix mais on en est pas loin)

Autant je recommandais ce jeu en 2016-17 mais là on est en 2019 donc tournez vous plutôt vers des jeux de ce type mais plus récents.

Je pense concrètement que c'est gâché son argent d'acheter ce jeu de nos jours, vous avez loupé le train de la hype pour ce jeu et il est maintenant loin de son âge d'or.

En tout cas je ne prends plus aucun plaisir à y jouer que ce soit en tueur ou en survivant.

Also mir persöhnlich gefällt das Spiel sehr!
Natürlich ist es ärgerlich wenn man einen Camper als Killer hat aber das sagt nichts zum eigentlichen Spiel aus. Das Prinzip ist simpel und ich finde mit einer eingespielten Truppe macht es umso mehr Spaß.

Das einzig negative ist das es ab und an Bugs gibt wie zum Beispiel das wenn man eine Lobby betritt und nicht nochmal extra die Opfergabe auswählt diese nicht in der Runde aktiv ist aber dennoch nach der Runde verbrannt wurde.

Ansonsten kann ich dieses Spiel allen Leuten empfehlen die es mögen andere gnadenlos zu jagen oder eben den Nervenkitzel des Gejagten spüren zu wollen.
Super fun game I recommand it!

Juegazo, pudes pensar que puede ser repetitivo, pero nada más allá de la realidad, diversión constante tanto de superviviente como de asesino. Totalmente recomendado.

well I DID love this game. for the price you\re getting alot of content. But, my profile for some reason was wiped and my killers and survivor levels, along with all my perks, items, add-ons AND offerings are now non existent. i can't reccomend this game when such a fundamentally broken error can occur for whatever reason. if my stuff is added back somehow i'll switch the review to a positive one and re-write this. But for now, steer clear
